name: Modular plane prototype
description:
This is a quick prototype I made after watching Gundam Seed Destiny.
It's inspired by this sequence : https://youtu.be/B33OvWdeXfg?t=5
This prototype necessitates a game controller to be played.
Instructions are shown at game launch.

3D models courtesy of : Ebal Studios (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/space/star-sparrow-modular-spa...)
